panels.content:
Welcome to Linux Kernel CI report database (**KCIDB**) dashboard.
Here you can find testing reports aggregated from multiple CI systems ("**origins**").
This is a work in progress, and we welcome contributions and participation.
See the source code for [the collection system][kcidb], and for [this dashboard][kcidb-grafana].
Write to [kernelci@lists.linux.dev][maillist] if you want to start submitting results from your CI system,
or if you want to receive customized notifications of arriving results.

[kcidb]: https://github.com/kernelci/kcidb/
[kcidb-grafana]: https://github.com/kernelci/kcidb-grafana/
[maillist]: mailto:kernelci@lists.linux.dev
panels.title: Welcome

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    IF(${origin} = "%", "All", ${origin}) AS origin_param,
    IF(${build_architecture} = "%", "All", ${build_architecture}) AS build_architecture_param,
    IF(${build_config_name} = "%", "All", ${build_config_name}) AS build_config_name_param,
    IF(STARTS_WITH(${dataset:json}, "playground_"), "Playground", "Production") AS this_dataset_title,
    IF(STARTS_WITH(${dataset:json}, "playground_"), "Production", "Playground") AS other_dataset_title,
    IF(STARTS_WITH(${dataset:json}, "playground_"), REGEXP_REPLACE(${dataset:json}, "^playground_", ""), CONCAT("playground_", ${dataset:json})) AS other_dataset_name

/* Massage */
SELECT
    IF(${origin} = "%", "All", ${origin}) AS origin_param,
    IF(${build_architecture} = "%", "All", ${build_architecture}) AS build_architecture_param,
    IF(${build_config_name} = "%", "All", ${build_config_name}) AS build_config_name_param,
    git_repository_url,
    IF(git_repository_branches IS NULL,
       "",
       IF(ARRAY_LENGTH(git_repository_branches) <= 3,
          ARRAY_TO_STRING(git_repository_branches, ", "),
          (SELECT CONCAT(STRING_AGG(branch, ", "), " (+", (ARRAY_LENGTH(git_repository_branches) - 3), ")")
           FROM (SELECT branch FROM UNNEST(git_repository_branches) AS branch ORDER BY branch DESC LIMIT 3)
          )
       )
    ) AS git_repository_branches_string,
    checkouts
FROM (
    /* Aggregate */
    SELECT git_repository_url, git_repository_branches, checkouts
    FROM (
        SELECT DISTINCT git_repository_url
        FROM ${dataset}.checkouts
        WHERE git_repository_url IS NOT NULL
    )
    LEFT OUTER JOIN (
        SELECT
            git_repository_url,
            ARRAY_AGG(DISTINCT git_repository_branch) AS git_repository_branches,
            COUNT(id) AS checkouts
        FROM ${dataset}.checkouts
        WHERE IFNULL(start_time BETWEEN TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__from) AND TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__to) AND origin LIKE ${origin}, TRUE)
        GROUP BY git_repository_url
    ) USING(git_repository_url)
)
ORDER BY checkouts DESC, git_repository_url ASC

/* Massage */
SELECT
    IF(${origin} = "%", "All", ${origin}) AS origin_param,
    IF(${build_architecture} = "%", "All", ${build_architecture}) AS build_architecture_param,
    IF(${build_config_name} = "%", "All", ${build_config_name}) AS build_config_name_param,
    origins,
    path,
    architectures,
    tests,
    status_num
FROM (
    /* Aggregate */
    SELECT
        STRING_AGG(DISTINCT origin, ", ") AS origins,
        LEFT(base_prefix, CHAR_LENGTH(base_prefix) - 1) AS path,
        STRING_AGG(DISTINCT architecture, ", ") AS architectures,
        COUNT(DISTINCT id) AS tests,
        MAX((CASE status WHEN "ERROR" THEN 5 WHEN "FAIL" THEN 4 WHEN "PASS" THEN 3 WHEN "DONE" THEN 2 WHEN "SKIP" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) -
            (CASE waived WHEN false THEN 0 WHEN true THEN 1 ELSE 2 END) * 6) AS status_num
    FROM (
        /* Filter tests and extract path prefixes */
        SELECT
            tests.origin,
            tests.id,
            /* Prefix one level deeper than the displayed test's path */
            IFNULL(
                NULLIF(
                    /* Cut the test path up to and including the first dot */
                    LEFT(tests.path, INSTR(tests.path, ".", 2)),
                    ""
                ),
                tests.path || "."
            ) AS base_prefix,
            builds.architecture,
            tests.status AS status,
            tests.waived AS waived
        FROM ${dataset}.tests
        INNER JOIN
            ${dataset}.builds AS builds
            ON
                tests.build_id = builds.id AND
                IFNULL(builds.architecture LIKE ${build_architecture}, TRUE) AND
                IFNULL(builds.config_name LIKE ${build_config_name}, TRUE)
        WHERE
            tests.start_time BETWEEN TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__from) AND TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__to) AND
            tests.origin LIKE ${origin} AND
            tests.path IS NOT NULL AND
            tests.path != ""
    )
    GROUP BY
        base_prefix
)
ORDER BY
    tests DESC,
    path ASC

/*
 * Truncate a string with an ellipsis at speÑified length.
 */
CREATE TEMP FUNCTION TRUNCATE(str STRING, len INT64)
    RETURNS STRING
    AS (IF(len = 0 OR CHAR_LENGTH(str) <= len,
           str,
           CONCAT(SUBSTR(str, 1, len - 1), "â€¦")
       ));

/*
 * Replace NULL or empty string with a non-breaking space,
 * truncate anything else with ellipsis, if necessary.
 */
CREATE TEMP FUNCTION BLANK_OR_TRUNCATE(str STRING, len INT64)
    RETURNS STRING
    AS (IF(str IS NULL OR str = "", "Â ", TRUNCATE(str, len)));

/*
 * Format an array of strings as a three-line text with ellipsis
 */
CREATE TEMP FUNCTION ARRAY_TO_TEXT(strs ARRAY<STRING>, width INT64)
    RETURNS STRING
    AS (ARRAY_TO_STRING(
        [
            BLANK_OR_TRUNCATE(strs[SAFE_OFFSET(0)], width),
            BLANK_OR_TRUNCATE(strs[SAFE_OFFSET(1)], width),
            IF(ARRAY_LENGTH(strs) > 3, "â€¦",
               BLANK_OR_TRUNCATE(strs[SAFE_OFFSET(2)], width))
        ],
        "\n"
    ));

WITH
    filtered_checkouts AS (
        SELECT
            *
        FROM
            ${dataset}.checkouts
        WHERE
            origin LIKE ${origin} AND
            IFNULL(checkouts.start_time BETWEEN TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__from) AND TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__to), TRUE)
    ),
    revision_sources AS (
        SELECT
            git_commit_hash,
            patchset_hash,
            ARRAY_TO_TEXT(
                ARRAY_AGG(git_repository_url_str
                          ORDER BY rank DESC, git_repository_url_str,
                                   git_repository_branch_str, git_commit_name_str),
                128
            ) AS git_repository_urls_text,
            ARRAY_TO_TEXT(
                ARRAY_AGG(git_repository_branch_str
                          ORDER BY rank DESC, git_repository_url_str,
                                   git_repository_branch_str, git_commit_name_str),
                32
            ) AS git_repository_branches_text,
            ARRAY_TO_TEXT(
                ARRAY_AGG(git_commit_name_str
                          ORDER BY rank DESC, git_repository_url_str,
                                   git_repository_branch_str, git_commit_name_str),
                32
            ) AS git_commit_names_text,
        FROM (
            SELECT
                git_commit_hash,
                patchset_hash,
                git_repository_url_str,
                git_repository_branch_str,
                git_commit_name_str,
                IF(git_repository_url_str = "", 0, 4) +
                    IF(git_repository_branch_str = "", 0, 2) +
                    IF(git_commit_name_str = "", 0, 1) AS rank
            FROM (
                SELECT DISTINCT
                    git_commit_hash,
                    patchset_hash,
                    IFNULL(git_repository_url, "") AS git_repository_url_str,
                    IFNULL(git_repository_branch, "") AS git_repository_branch_str,
                    IFNULL(git_commit_name, "") AS git_commit_name_str,
                FROM
                    filtered_checkouts
            )
        )
        GROUP BY
            git_commit_hash,
            patchset_hash
    )
/* Massage and join with sources */
SELECT
    IF(${origin} = "%", "All", ${origin}) AS origin_param,
    IF(${build_architecture} = "%", "All", ${build_architecture}) AS build_architecture_param,
    IF(${build_config_name} = "%", "All", ${build_config_name}) AS build_config_name_param,
    revisions.git_commit_hash,
    revisions.patchset_hash,
    origins_str,
    SUBSTR(revisions.git_commit_hash, 0, 12) AS git_commit_hash_short,
    revision_sources.git_repository_urls_text,
    revision_sources.git_repository_branches_text,
    revision_sources.git_commit_names_text,
    SUBSTR(revisions.patchset_hash, 0, 12) AS patchset_hash_short,
    IFNULL(CAST(checkouts_start_time AS STRING), "") AS checkouts_start_time_str,
    checkouts_valid_num,
    builds_valid_num,
    tests_status_num
FROM (
    /* Calculate revision statuses */
    SELECT
        checkouts.git_commit_hash,
        checkouts.patchset_hash,
        STRING_AGG(DISTINCT checkouts.origin, ", ") AS origins_str,
        MIN(checkouts.start_time) AS checkouts_start_time,
        MAX(CASE checkouts.valid WHEN false THEN 1 WHEN true THEN 0 ELSE -1 END) AS checkouts_valid_num,
        MAX(CASE builds.valid WHEN false THEN 1 WHEN true THEN 0 ELSE -1 END) AS builds_valid_num,
        MAX((CASE tests.status WHEN "ERROR" THEN 5 WHEN "FAIL" THEN 4 WHEN "PASS" THEN 3 WHEN "DONE" THEN 2 WHEN "SKIP" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) -
            (CASE tests.waived WHEN false THEN 0 WHEN true THEN 1 ELSE 2 END) * 6) AS tests_status_num
    FROM
        filtered_checkouts AS checkouts
    LEFT OUTER JOIN
        ${dataset}.builds AS builds
        ON
            builds.checkout_id = checkouts.id AND
            IFNULL(builds.architecture LIKE ${build_architecture}, TRUE) AND
            IFNULL(builds.config_name LIKE ${build_config_name}, TRUE)
    LEFT OUTER JOIN
        ${dataset}.tests AS tests
        ON
            tests.build_id = builds.id
    GROUP BY
        checkouts.git_commit_hash,
        checkouts.patchset_hash
) AS revisions
INNER JOIN
    revision_sources
    ON
        revision_sources.git_commit_hash = revisions.git_commit_hash AND
        revision_sources.patchset_hash = revisions.patchset_hash
ORDER BY
    checkouts_start_time DESC

WITH intervals AS (
    SELECT
        interval_start,
        TIMESTAMP_ADD(interval_start, INTERVAL $__interval_ms*50 MILLISECOND) AS interval_end
    FROM UNNEST(
        GENERATE_TIMESTAMP_ARRAY(TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__from),
                                 TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__to),
                                 INTERVAL $__interval_ms*50 MILLISECOND)
    ) AS interval_start
)
SELECT
    interval_start AS time,
    CASE builds.valid WHEN true THEN "PASS" WHEN false THEN "FAIL" ELSE "UNKNOWN" END AS metric,
    COUNT(DISTINCT builds.id) AS builds
FROM ${dataset}.builds AS builds
INNER JOIN intervals ON builds.start_time >= interval_start AND builds.start_time < interval_end
WHERE
  builds.origin LIKE ${origin} AND
  IFNULL(builds.architecture LIKE ${build_architecture}, TRUE) AND
  IFNULL(builds.config_name LIKE ${build_config_name}, TRUE)
GROUP BY time, metric
ORDER BY time ASC, metric ASC

WITH intervals AS (
    SELECT
        interval_start,
        TIMESTAMP_ADD(interval_start, INTERVAL $__interval_ms*50 MILLISECOND) AS interval_end
    FROM UNNEST(
        GENERATE_TIMESTAMP_ARRAY(TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__from),
                                 TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__to),
                                 INTERVAL $__interval_ms*50 MILLISECOND)
    ) AS interval_start
)
SELECT
  interval_start AS time,
  IFNULL(tests.status, "UNKNOWN") AS metric,
  COUNT(DISTINCT tests.id) AS tests
FROM
  ${dataset}.builds AS builds, ${dataset}.tests AS tests
INNER JOIN intervals ON tests.start_time >= interval_start AND tests.start_time < interval_end
WHERE
  builds.id = tests.build_id AND
  tests.origin LIKE ${origin} AND
  IFNULL(builds.architecture LIKE ${build_architecture}, TRUE) AND
  IFNULL(builds.config_name LIKE ${build_config_name}, TRUE)
GROUP BY
  time, metric
ORDER BY
  time ASC, metric ASC

WITH intervals AS (
    SELECT
        interval_start,
        TIMESTAMP_ADD(interval_start, INTERVAL $__interval_ms*50 MILLISECOND) AS interval_end
    FROM UNNEST(
        GENERATE_TIMESTAMP_ARRAY(TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__from),
                                 TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__to),
                                 INTERVAL $__interval_ms*50 MILLISECOND)
    ) AS interval_start
), filtered_checkouts AS (
    SELECT
        checkouts.id AS id,
        checkouts.origin AS origin,
        checkouts.start_time AS time
    FROM
        ${dataset}.checkouts AS checkouts
    WHERE
    	checkouts.start_time BETWEEN TIMESTAMP_MILLIS ($__from) AND TIMESTAMP_MILLIS ($__to)
), filtered_builds AS (
    SELECT
        builds.id AS id,
        builds.origin AS origin,
        builds.start_time AS time
    FROM
        ${dataset}.builds AS builds,
        filtered_checkouts
    WHERE
    	builds.start_time BETWEEN TIMESTAMP_MILLIS ($__from) AND TIMESTAMP_MILLIS ($__to) AND
        IFNULL(builds.architecture LIKE ${build_architecture}, TRUE) AND
        IFNULL(builds.config_name LIKE ${build_config_name}, TRUE) AND
        filtered_checkouts.id = builds.checkout_id
), filtered_tests AS (
    SELECT
        tests.id AS id,
        tests.origin AS origin,
        tests.start_time AS time
    FROM
        ${dataset}.tests AS tests,
        filtered_builds
    WHERE
    	tests.start_time BETWEEN TIMESTAMP_MILLIS ($__from) AND TIMESTAMP_MILLIS ($__to) AND
        filtered_builds.id = tests.build_id
)
SELECT
    interval_start AS time,
    counted_checkouts.count AS Checkouts,
    counted_builds.count AS Builds,
    counted_tests.count AS Tests
FROM intervals
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
    SELECT interval_start, COUNT(id) AS count,
    FROM filtered_checkouts
    INNER JOIN intervals ON time >= interval_start AND time < interval_end
    WHERE origin LIKE ${origin}
    GROUP BY interval_start
) AS counted_checkouts USING(interval_start)
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
    SELECT interval_start, COUNT(id) AS count,
    FROM filtered_builds
    INNER JOIN intervals ON time >= interval_start AND time < interval_end
    WHERE origin LIKE ${origin}
    GROUP BY interval_start
) AS counted_builds USING(interval_start)
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
    SELECT interval_start, COUNT(id) AS count,
    FROM filtered_tests
    INNER JOIN intervals ON time >= interval_start AND time < interval_end
    WHERE origin LIKE ${origin}
    GROUP BY interval_start
) AS counted_tests USING(interval_start)

WITH intervals AS (
    SELECT
        interval_start,
        TIMESTAMP_ADD(interval_start, INTERVAL $__interval_ms*50 MILLISECOND) AS interval_end
    FROM UNNEST(
        GENERATE_TIMESTAMP_ARRAY(TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__from),
                                 TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__to),
                                 INTERVAL $__interval_ms*50 MILLISECOND)
    ) AS interval_start
)
SELECT
  interval_start AS time,
  builds.architecture AS metric,
  COUNT(DISTINCT builds.id) AS Builds
FROM
  ${dataset}.builds AS builds
JOIN intervals ON start_time >= interval_start AND start_time < interval_end
WHERE
  builds.origin LIKE ${origin} AND
  IFNULL(builds.architecture LIKE ${build_architecture}, TRUE) AND
  IFNULL(builds.config_name LIKE ${build_config_name}, TRUE) AND
  builds.start_time BETWEEN TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(${__from}) AND TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(${__to})
GROUP BY
  time, metric
ORDER BY
  time ASC, metric ASC
